ResearchProjectDef.label: Aquaculture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Aquaculture basins are perfect to produce your own tasty seafood. Learn how to adapt your hydroponics into aquaculture basin to breed seafood.
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered: You have developped a modified version of the hydroponic basin: the aquaculture basin. - You can now build the aquaculture basin to breed seafood. - Aquaculture basins must be supplied some raw food from an adjacent hopper.
